5#ifndef V8_HEAP_COMBINED_HEAP_H_
6#define V8_HEAP_COMBINED_HEAP_H_
7
8#include "src/heap/heap.h"
9#include "src/heap/read-only-heap.h"
10#include "src/heap/safepoint.h"
11#include "src/heap/third-party/heap-api.h"
12#include "src/objects/objects.h"
13
14namespace v8 {
15namespace internal {
16
17// This class allows iteration over the entire heap (Heap and ReadOnlyHeap). It
18// uses the HeapObjectIterator to iterate over non-read-only objects and accepts
19// the same filtering option.
20class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE CombinedHeapObjectIterator final {
21 public:
22 CombinedHeapObjectIterator(
23 Heap* heap, HeapObjectIterator::HeapObjectsFiltering filtering =
24 HeapObjectIterator::HeapObjectsFiltering::kNoFiltering);
25 Tagged<HeapObject> Next();
26
27 private:
28 HeapObjectIterator heap_iterator_;
29 ReadOnlyHeapObjectIterator ro_heap_iterator_;
30};
31
32V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT inline bool IsValidHeapObject(Heap* heap,
33 Tagged<HeapObject> object) {
34 if (V8_ENABLE_THIRD_PARTY_HEAP_BOOL) {
35 return third_party_heap::Heap::IsValidHeapObject(object);
36 }
37 return ReadOnlyHeap::Contains(object) || heap->Contains(object) ||
38 heap->SharedHeapContains(object);
39}
40
41V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT inline bool IsValidCodeObject(Heap* heap,
42 Tagged<HeapObject> object) {
43 if (V8_ENABLE_THIRD_PARTY_HEAP_BOOL) {
44 return third_party_heap::Heap::IsValidCodeObject(object);
45 }
46 if (V8_EXTERNAL_CODE_SPACE_BOOL) {
47 return heap->ContainsCode(object);
48 } else {
49 return ReadOnlyHeap::Contains(object) || heap->ContainsCode(object);
50 }
51}
52
53} // namespace internal
54} // namespace v8
55
56#endif // V8_HEAP_COMBINED_HEAP_H_
